Speaker: Customer
Text: Call center, healthcare provider, role play number one.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Call center agent, and customer.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Thank you for calling Vital Care Health Solutions.

Speaker: Agent
Text: My name is Terry.

Speaker: Agent
Text: How may I assist you today?

Speaker: Customer
Text: Hello, I'm calling because I have some questions about my health insurance plan and coverage.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Of course, I'm here to help.

Speaker: Agent
Text: May I have your name and policy number please?

Speaker: Customer
Text: Sure.

Speaker: Customer
Text: My name is Thomas K. Douglas, and my policy number is...

Speaker: Customer
Text: Hold on.

Speaker: Customer
Text: I have it here on a piece of paper.

Speaker: Customer
Text: It's VC253 dash 7107.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Thank you, Mr. Douglas.

Speaker: Agent
Text: What questions do you have regarding your health insurance plan and coverage?

Speaker: Customer
Text: Well, first of all, I'm not sure about the coverage for preventive care.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Can you explain what's included in my plan?

Speaker: Agent
Text: Certainly, I'd be happy to answer that.

Speaker: Agent
Text: With your plan, you have comprehensive coverage for preventive care, including vaccinations, screenings, and annual checkups.

Speaker: Agent
Text: These services are generally covered at 100%, meaning you won't have to pay any out-of-pocket costs for them.

Speaker: Customer
Text: That's great to know.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Secondly, I recently started a new medication, and I'm curious if it's covered under my prescription drug benefits.

Speaker: Agent
Text: I understand the importance of medication coverage.

Speaker: Agent
Text: To provide accurate information, could you please tell me the name of the medication and the dosage?

Speaker: Customer
Text: It's called Health Aid, and I take the 20-milligram dosage.

Speaker: Customer
Text: It's one pill per day.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Thank you for that information.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Let me check that for you.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Please give me a few seconds.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Yes, I found it.

Speaker: Agent
Text: You'll be responsible for a co-payment of $20 per 30-day supply when you fill your prescription at a network pharmacy.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Perfect.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Lastly, I'm planning on taking a trip abroad next month.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Will my health insurance cover international medical expenses?

Speaker: Agent
Text: That's a great question.

Speaker: Agent
Text: While your plan does offer some coverage for emergency medical expenses abroad, it's essential to be aware that coverage may be limited.

Speaker: Agent
Text: I recommend contacting our travel assistance hotline before your trip to get more information and guidance on international coverage.

Speaker: Agent
Text: They'll be able to provide specific details.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Thank you for the detailed information.

Speaker: Customer
Text: I feel much more informed now.

Speaker: Customer
Text: I recently got a new job so my insurance policy is a little different compared to my previous job.

Speaker: Customer
Text: I just haven't had time to work out the specifics.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Of course, sir, I completely understand.

Speaker: Agent
Text: If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out to any of our representatives and we would be happy to answer your questions or concerns.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Thank you for that.

Speaker: Customer
Text: What's your name again?

Speaker: Agent
Text: It's Terry.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Thank you, Terry. You've been very helpful.

Speaker: Agent
Text: It has been my pleasure, Mr. Douglas.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Do you have any other questions at this time?

Speaker: Customer
Text: No, I think you've answered them all.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Thanks again.

Speaker: Agent
Text: You are most welcome. Have a wonderful day.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Goodbye.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Goodbye.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Call center, healthcare provider, role play number two.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Call center agent and customer.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Thank you for calling vital care health solutions. My name is Carson.

Speaker: Customer
Text: How may I assist you today?

Speaker: Customer
Text: Hi. I have a few questions about my health insurance, specifically regarding mental health coverage.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Of course, I can most certainly help you with that.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Could you please provide your name and policy number?

Speaker: Customer
Text: Sure. My name is Monique Rodriguez and my policy number is M987-654-321.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Thank you, Monique. Is there anything in particular you would like to know?

Speaker: Customer
Text: Well, I'm wondering about the specific mental health services covered by my plan.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Are therapy sessions and counseling included in the plan?

Speaker: Customer
Text: Absolutely, Monique. Your plan includes coverage for mental health services, including therapy and counseling.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Depending on the specifics of the provider and type of service, you may have a co-payment or co-insurance.

Speaker: Customer
Text: I can check your specific benefits if you provide me with the names of any mental health professionals you're considering.

Speaker: Customer
Text: That's good to know.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Second question. If I need to see a psychiatrist for medication management, how does that work with my insurance?

Speaker: Customer
Text: That's an important aspect of mental health care. If you need to consult with a psychiatrist for medication management, it falls under your behavioral health coverage.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Keep in mind, you may need a referral from your primary care physician, and any medications prescribed will be subject to your prescription drug benefits.

Speaker: Customer
Text: How can I get more information about which drugs are covered under my insurance plan?

Speaker: Customer
Text: If you do a search on our homepage, there is a list of drugs that are covered under each plan. You can also do a search for specific drugs to see if they are covered.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Got it. Lastly, I've heard about telehealth options for mental health services. Does my plan cover virtual therapy sessions?

Speaker: Customer
Text: Yes, Monique. Your plan does offer coverage for virtual therapy sessions through telehealth services.

Speaker: Customer
Text: It's a convenient option, especially in today's digital age. The same cost-sharing rules apply, but it provides flexibility for accessing mental health care from the comfort of your home.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Thank you for the information. That's really good to know.

Speaker: Customer
Text: You're welcome, Monique. If you have any more questions or need further clarification, don't hesitate to reach out. We're here to help.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Thank you. I think you answered all my questions.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Excellent. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

Speaker: Customer
Text: No, that should do it for now. Have yourself a nice day.

Speaker: Customer
Text: You too. Goodbye. Goodbye.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Remember to watch our other roleplay videos.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Thank you.
